title: Olympic champ Viktor Knoch and a day at the the halfpipe from Lausanne 2020
description: Hungarian speed skater Viktor Knoch explains how to comeback from a major setback. Plus, we spent the day in Leysin watching the women's halfpipe snowboard and freeski.
itunes:title: Olympic champ Viktor Knoch and a day at the the halfpipe from Lausanne 2020
itunes:summary: Hungarian speed skater Viktor Knoch explains how to comeback from a major setback. Plus, we spent the day in Leysin watching the women's halfpipe snowboard and freeski.
